# INTemperatureResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for the units to use with a temperature value.

## Declaration

```swift
class INTemperatureResolutionResult
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INTemperatureResolutionResult] object is what you return when resolving parameters containing an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSMeasurement] object with a temperature value. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to successfully resolve the parameter. For additional resolution options, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.
- **disambiguation(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.

## Measurements

- **INEnergyResolutionResult**: A resolution result for an energy parameter associated with an intent.
- **INLengthResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a length associated with an intent.
- **INMassResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a mass associated with an intent.
- **INSpeedResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a speed associated with an intent.
- **INVolumeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a volume associated with an intent.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
